com.qiscus.sdk

Class Qiscus

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qiscus.sdk.Qiscus

  • public class Qiscus
extends java.lang.Object
    The main class of Qiscus SDK. Init qiscus engine sdk, set qiscus user, start the chatting and all about qiscus configuration can be accessed from here.

    • Nested Class Summary

      static interface  Qiscus.SetUserListener

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static void init(android.app.Application application,
                        java.lang.String qiscusAppId)
        The first method you need to be invoke to using qiscus sdk. Call this method from your Application class. You can not using another qiscus feature if you not invoke this method first. Here sample to call this method: 
         
 public class SampleApps extends Application {
  public void onCreate() {
      super.onCreate();
      Qiscus.init(this, "yourQiscusAppId");
  }
 }
        Parameters:
        application - Application instance
        qiscusAppId - Your qiscus application Id

      • setUser

        public static Qiscus.SetUserBuilder setUser(java.lang.String userEmail,
                                            java.lang.String userKey)
        Use this method set qiscus user. If user doesn't exist at your qiscus engine, He/She will be registered automatically.
        Parameters:
        userEmail - The email or username of qiscus user
        userKey - Qiscus user key
        Returns:
        User builder

      • getApps

        public static android.app.Application getApps()
        Use this method if we need application context instance
        Returns:
        Your application instance

      • getAppsName

        public static java.lang.String getAppsName()
        Will return the exact apps name
        Returns:
        The apps name.

      • getAppsHandler

        public static android.os.Handler getAppsHandler()
        Needed to run something at main thread handler
        Returns:
        Main thread handler

      • getAppId

        public static java.lang.String getAppId()
        Accessor to get current qiscus app id
        Returns:
        Current qiscus app id

      • hasSetupUser

        public static boolean hasSetupUser()
        For checking is qiscus user has been setup
        Returns:
        true if already setup, false if not yet

      • getQiscusAccount

        public static QiscusAccount getQiscusAccount()
        Accessor to get current qiscus user account
        Returns:
        Current qiscus user account

      • getToken

        public static java.lang.String getToken()
        Accessor to get current qiscus user token
        Returns:
        Current qiscus user token

      • getDataStore

        public static QiscusDataStore getDataStore()
        Get current qiscus chat data store
        Returns:
        Singleton of qiscus data store

      • setDataStore

        public static void setDataStore(QiscusDataStore dataStore)
        Use this method if you want to use your own data store implementation, e.g using Realm, your own table, your own orm, etc
        Parameters:
        dataStore - Your own chat datastore

      • getChatConfig

        public static QiscusChatConfig getChatConfig()
        Use this method to get current qiscus chatting configuration, you can also modify it.
        Returns:
        Current qiscus chatting configuration

      • buildChatRoomWith

        public static Qiscus.ChatBuilder buildChatRoomWith(java.lang.String email)
        Use this method to open a chatting room with other user.
        Parameters:
        email - Email or username of other user to chat.
        Returns:
        Chat room builder

      • buildChatWith

        public static Qiscus.ChatActivityBuilder buildChatWith(java.lang.String email)
        Use this method to start an Activity for chatting with other user.
        Parameters:
        email - Email or username of other user to chat.
        Returns:
        Chatting Activity builder

      • buildChatFragmentWith

        public static Qiscus.ChatFragmentBuilder buildChatFragmentWith(java.lang.String email)
        Use this method if you want to generate a Fragment for chatting with other user.
        Parameters:
        email - Email or username of other user to chat.
        Returns:
        Chatting Fragment builder

      • setHeartBeat

        public static void setHeartBeat(long heartBeat)
        Set the heartbeat of qiscus synchronization chat data. Default value is 500ms
        Parameters:
        heartBeat - Heartbeat duration in milliseconds

      • getHeartBeat

        public static long getHeartBeat()
        Get the current qiscus heartbeat duration
        Returns:
        Heartbeat duration in milliseconds

      • clearUser

        public static void clearUser()
        Clear all current user qiscus data, you can call this method when user logout for example.
